headline: MELLES GRIOT ACTUATOR WITH CONTROLLER
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Positioning Equipment > Other Positioning Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Melles Griot
Model Nanomover
Description Two Actuators w/Controller
Other Information

Actuator Model Nanomover 11NCM001:
Resolution: 50 Nanometers
Bidrectional repeatability: +- 100 Nanometers
Absolute accuracy: 1 Micron
Cardinal step size: 1.25 microns
Travel: 25 mm
Max load: 10Kg
Max velocity: 2.5mm/second
Controller Model 11NC001:
Four channel

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Depth 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Height 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Weight 32 lb (15 kg)
